title: Can't throw my Winslash with my bind
body:
Hello,
When I try to throw my Wind slash ({{champion:92}}  ult)  i need to hit the bind (MB5 corner of the mouse) twice which makes me loose alot of time :/ 
Anyone know how to fix it , thanks !

replies.body:
Hey, sorry, this is most certainly a stupid question, but... better safe than sorry, you know ;)

You know that Riven's R is a two-part spell, right?
The first part (Blade of the Exile) simply restores your sword, making it bigger, giving you more AD and more range, but it doesn't do anything by itself.
It's only the second part (Wind Slash) that sends out the projectiles hurting your opponents.
So it's normal that you have to press your button two times, if you didn't already activate your ultimate beforehand.

It's probably not what's causing your problem, but just in case, it costs nothing to check.

It still hard, I tried to delete my config but still...
Somehow pro riven players like adrian, viper etc...always succeed their winslash :/

Hmmmmmm I wonder if the fact that it's bound to MB5 right now might be the main issue. If you know you can rebind it to that key, let's go ahead and try resetting your config settings to see if the source of the problem is lying hidden in there somewhere.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
